body.name: KANPETS Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 25kPa Utral Powerful Suction, Up to 40 Min, 6 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Cleaner Optimal Cleaning for Home Car Hardwood Tile Low Pile Carpets
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 42 mins
features: Enhanced Cleaning Performance: Tailored for American homes with hard floors, wood floors, and thin carpets. The advanced 5-series motor brushhead ensures thorough cleaning across different surfaces.

Unmatched Brushless Motor: Unlike traditional brushed motors that overheat and have limited lifespans, our top-tier brushless motor delivers consistent and powerful suction, meeting daily cleaning needs.
Craftsmanship Unveiled: Crafted from premium materials, leaving no room for recycled plastics. Safety, longevity, and sustainability converge.

Extended 40-Min Runtime: Equipped with a detachable, rechargeable high-quality lithium battery, providing up to 40 minutes of runtime. Engage the turbo boost mode for 15 minutes of intense suction. Enhance your cleaning time by purchasing our larger capacity battery from our store.

Efficient Filtration Redefined: Our vacuum incorporates a true cyclonic filtration system, reducing filter clogging and maintaining steady suction. With a capacious 1.2L dustbin and HEPA filter, it efficiently captures debris while preventing secondary contamination.
body.description: Experience the KANPETS Cordless Vacuum, designed to meet your home's unique cleaning needs. Engineered for hardwood, tile, and low-pile carpets in modern American homes, this vacuum is your essential cleaning companion.**Tailored Cleaning**Our standout 5-series motor brush delivers superior performance on hardwood, tile, and low-pile carpets, ensuring dust-free living spaces that resonate with modern living.**Crafted for Durability**Experience a vacuum built to last, prioritizing your safety and performance. KANPETS' premium materials eliminate concerns about longevity, ensuring a reliable cleaning partner.**Revolutionary Brushless Motor**Embrace silent operation and consistent suction with our innovative brushless motor. Extend the life of your vacuum while enjoying efficient cleaning results.**Uninterrupted Cleaning**Effortlessly navigate through cleaning tasks with a detachable lithium battery providing up to 40 mins of runtime. Engage turbo boost mode for intensive 15-min cleaning sessions.**Efficient Filtration**Bid farewell to clogged filters with our true cyclonic system. Enjoy cleaner air quality with a 1.2L dustbin and HEPA filter.Elevate your cleaning experience with the KANPETS Cordless Vacuum. It's more than a tool; it's an investment in modern, efficient cleaning. Our commitment extends beyond purchase, offering 12 months of dedicated after-sales support. Discover the joy of receiving this beautifully packaged vacuum, perfect for gifting on any occasion.What You Will Get:1X Main Motor1X 2000mAh Detachable Battery2X 2-in-1 Brushes1X Extension Metal Tube1X Motorized Brush Head1X AC Charger1X Wall-mount Kit1X 2-in-1 Cleaning Brush12-month Warranty( And an extra 3-month warranty after registed from offical supprt team

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KANPETS Cordless Vacuum Cleaner-The Best Choice for Your Family and Pets Why Choose KANPETS Cordless Vacuum Cleaner? Advanced 5-series motor brushhead Easy to clean dirt and dust particles to different cleaning needs 25000Pa Powerful Suction Cordless stick vacuum easily Remove the Deep-Seated Dirt True Cyclonic Filtration System Vacuum for pet hairs captures dust and particles to 0.3 microns Long-Lasting Using Time Offer up to 40 minutes working time,One full charge = whole house cleaning Low Noise and Lightweight Design Vacuum broom ultra-quiet operation sound avoids annoying noise,weighing only 5.5lbs easily converts to a handheld Motorized Brush with LED Light Enable you to glides across all floors and the front LED lights make it easily to see the dust under furniture or in hard-to-reach corner

FOR BETTER USE: Please use the original adapter to charge the battery cordless powerful vacuumPlease clean the filter and keep dry after each use to keep a good function of the stick vacuum cleaner cordless.Please confirm the brush head, cup and filter are installed correctly before use the portable vacuum cordless.Please don't use the cordless floor cleaner to suction anywhere with water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the design
reviews.reviewText: The vacuum cleaner comes in a small package that is easy for the girls to carry. I love the design of this vacuum cleaner, the pole is retractable and the two vacuum heads are movable. It is very convenient to use. The pole is thick and looks sturdy Installation was very easy. The outlet of the vacuum cleaner is directed towards the front, which I like. The suction power is also ok. Overall good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean like butter
reviews.reviewText: This cordless vacuum is a total game-changer! Seriously, it's like a dirt-busting superhero. The suction power is off the charts, and it zips around effortlessly. I love that it's lightweight, making it a breeze to clean every nook and cranny. Battery life? Surprisingly impressive – I cleaned my whole place without a recharge. The attachments are like magic wands for tricky spots. Emptying the dustbin is a piece of cake, and the whole thing is just low-maintenance awesomeness. If you want a vacuum that makes cleaning oddly satisfying, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong suction power
reviews.reviewText: The cordless vacuum is easy to assemble and provide strong suction. The battery life is good and the product is well built. I really like the feature that it's extendable and the LED light is very useful. Also the extra adapter are good to clean the hard to reach area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice vacuum set for daily use
reviews.reviewText: I got this set because my old vacuum finally broke, I was a little nervous when I just got it because it’s so light, but it’s actually pretty powerful! Very happy with my purchase, 15 mins in the morning and my floor is clean with no cat hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wrong dock color
reviews.reviewText: I really love this vacuum and I can’t rave enough about how well it does on my high carpet and then on my hardwood floor, but they sent me the wrong color docking station! I don’t know how to get a hold of the seller to send me the white docking station I don’t wanna send the whole vacuum back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dyson Dupe Straight Comparison
reviews.reviewText: Great vacuum similar strong suction as Dyson but it’s way cheaper. Easy and smooth to move around. Only downside I would say is this vacuum is louder than Dyson but after using coupon 80 bucks I think it’s doing a decent job. And the white color looks chic too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it nice package
reviews.reviewText: Like the packing, easy to use and being wireless is the best thing ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is very handy and powerful
reviews.reviewText: This is very cost friendly compare to other brands. And the quality is great. Cleaned all the fur and hair on my sofa and as well as the bed, not to mention the floor.
